snippet: Friday and the weekend: a struggle for L.G.B.T. protections, more chilly weather, protests on Saturday, and the week in pictures.
abstract: Friday and the weekend: a struggle for L.G.B.T. protections, more chilly weather, protests on Saturday, and the week in pictures.

byline.original: By ANNIE CORREAL and ANDY NEWMAN

lead_paragraph: Good morning on this frosty Friday, and happy National Ugly Christmas Sweater Day.

headline.main: New York Today: The Push for Gay Rights
